apis.name: List protected environments
apis.description: Gets a list of protected environments from a project:

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the protected environment

apis.name: Protect repository environments
apis.description: Elements in the deploy_access_levels array should be one of user_id, group_id or access_level, and take the form {user_id: integer}, {group_id: integer} or {access_level: integer}. Each user must have access to the project and each group must have this project shared.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: deploy_access_levels
attributes.description: Array of access levels allowed to deploy, with each described by a hash.

attributes.name: required_approval_count
attributes.description: The number of approvals required to deploy to this environment. This is part of Deployment Approvals, which isnâ€™t yet available for use. For details, see issue.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project owned by the authenticated user.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the protected environment.
